select count(1) from t_wb_order LEFT JOIN t_wb_user on t_wb_user.id = t_wb_order.user_id LEFT JOIN t_merchant on t_merchant.id = t_wb_order.merchant_id
where t_wb_order.merchant_id in
#{ages}
and (t_wb_user.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') or t_wb_user.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%'))
and t_wb_order.order_id like CONCAT('%',#{orderId},'%')
and t_merchant.merchant_name like CONCAT('%',#{merchantName},'%')
AND t_wb_order.create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_wb_order LEFT JOIN t_wb_user ON t_wb_order.user_id = t_wb_user.id LEFT JOIN t_merchant on t_merchant.id = t_wb_order.merchant_id WHERE t_wb_order.status >= 1
and t_wb_order.merchant_id = #{merchantId}
and t_wb_order.pay_time like CONCAT(#{dateOfTransaction},'%')
and t_wb_user.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')

SELECT r.merchant_id recConsumptionMerchantId, SUM(total) total_consumption, r.rec_consumption_area FROM ( SELECT a.pay_time, a.merchant_id, SUM(final_amount) total, COUNT(merchant_id) rec_consumption_area FROM ( SELECT t.final_amount, t.pay_time, t.merchant_id, t.user_id, t.status FROM t_wb_order AS t WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND status IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY pay_time DESC ) AS a GROUP BY merchant_id ORDER BY rec_consumption_area DESC, pay_time DESC )AS r
SELECT pay_time rec_consumption_time, status FROM t_wb_order WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND status IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY rec_consumption_time DESC LIMIT 0, 1
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) FROM t_merchant_finance_flow WHERE transaction_way_value in (1,2) AND merchant_finance_id = #{merchantId}
